meanings.definition: Restrict the inheritance of (property) to a specified line of heirs.
meanings.sent1: The will entailed that the house could only be passed down to family members.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tradition entailed passing the crown to the eldest son.
meanings.sent3: The quirky uncle's will entailed a treasure hunt for the rightful heir.
meanings.sent4: The enchanted ring entailed magical powers to the chosen heir.
meanings.sent5: The cursed amulet entailed a dark secret within the family.
